title: MPfree: Blank Spaces – Hold Fast
body:
Is summer over already? Has it begun yet? I’m not quite sure to be perfectly honest; the drab weather we’ve experienced in the UK over the past couple of months has me longing to uproot, leave England behind and set sail for a place where the sun occasionally breaks through the clouds.

This track from London musician [**Blank Spaces**](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Blank-Spaces/203543427192?sk=info) appears to echo my sentiments entirely, if not through the lyrics but through the melancholic sound.

Coming in at almost six minutes, _Hold Fast_ is upbeat to a point; the hook is lively enough, the percussion section is steadfast yet the lyrics are slightly more downcast. _‘Smiling although your heart is breaking with the pain of it’_ and _‘from a kiss to an unanswered call’_, just two of the examples of the storytelling lyrical content of the track. Upon further listens, more intricacies are revealed to lie within _Hold Fast_, however it’s still primarily a classic pop track, and there’s nothing at all wrong with that when it’s done this well. Check out the video below, and head over to **Blank Spaces’** [bandcamp](http://blankspaces1.bandcamp.com/track/hold-fast) for a free download of _Hold Fast_.
